abstract: “Congress absolutely should have the opportunity to review this deal. We shouldn’t just count on the administration, who appears to want a deal at any cost.” — Speaker John A. Boehner, discussing an agreement over Iran’s nuclear program.

headline.main: Verbatim: Boehner Pushes Iran Deal Review

snippet: “Congress absolutely should have the opportunity to review this deal. We shouldn’t just count on the administration, who appears to want a deal at any cost.” — Speaker John A. Boehner, discussing an agreement over Iran’s nuclear program.
